paragraph.paragraph: Assembly nodes, depicted by the common ../images/assembly/assembly.ico icon, match the url*Component References compiled into a project when last ../../compiling_projects/index.xmlBuilt. EiffelEnvision only will show the references from the last build because of the task of performing url*Referenced Assembly Type and Feature Name Conversion, done as compilation-time.

Expanding each assembly nodes will yield a flat list of namespaces found in the corresponding assembly. Namespace, just like in the vxurfObjectBrowserS 0 Visual Studio .NET Object Browser , are denoted by the ../images/assembly/namespace.ico icon. In turn, expanding a namespace node will yield a list of types.xml.NET Type Nodes contained within the corresponding namespace.

seealso.help_link: vxgrfClassViewIcons 0 Class View and Object Browser Icons
